nodes.text: Ryien was a planet in the Cholganna system of the Outer Rim Territories. It orbited the star Chol, with a smaller planet, Chol, and a larger planet, Cholganna orbiting more closely than it and one larger planet, Be'ekk, orbiting further away. It was grey in color. The Cholganna system was partially engulfed by the Chol Nebula, and the planets in the Star system passed through the nebula during their orbit.
Ryien first appeared in 2013 in Beyond the Rim an adventure module written by Sterling Hershey for the Fantasy Flight Games roleplaying game, Star Wars: Edge of the Empire.
